name: Key2Joy
description:
Made in a single weekend, partly as a joke, partly as a form of relief from some post-test stress.

Key2Joy is a simple compliment engine. The more you press keys or tap the screen, the more ways the game will compliment you. Mellow tunes and simple minimalistic visuals are designed to help calm your spirit.

Featuring 2 songs not at all by me:

Soft: GuitarooMan - Legendary Theme (Acoustic)
Warm: Yasuo Sako - Gran Turismo 4 OST - Gymnopedie No. 1
